scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.build:ios:e2e: npm run build && expo build:ios --release-channel e2e
scripts.build:ios:develop: npm run build && expo build:ios --release-channel develop
scripts.build:ios:staging: npm run build && expo build:ios --release-channel staging
scripts.build:ios:production: npm run build && expo build:ios --release-channel production
scripts.build:android:e2e: npm run build && expo build:android --release-channel e2e
scripts.build:android:develop: npm run build && expo build:android --release-channel develop
scripts.build:android:staging: npm run build && expo build:android --release-channel staging
scripts.build:android:production: npm run build && expo build:android --release-channel production
scripts.publish:ios:e2e: npm run build && expo publish --release-channel e2e
scripts.publish:ios:develop: npm run build && expo publish --release-channel develop
scripts.publish:ios:staging: npm run build && expo publish --release-channel staging
scripts.publish:ios:production: npm run build && expo publish --release-channel production
scripts.publish:android:e2e: npm run build && expo publish --release-channel e2e
scripts.publish:android:develop: npm run build && expo publish --release-channel develop
scripts.publish:android:staging: npm run build && expo publish --release-channel staging
scripts.publish:android:production: npm run build && expo publish --release-channel production
